# Special thanks to DXO for sharing sensor color matrix data

# Model
# RGGB-Position(0:RGGB, 1:GBRG) Base-Noise-Reduction(0:Off, 1:On) Black Saturation [Extended Black/Sat lines]
# rawRGB Relative Sensitivity, CIE-D50, CIE-A
# sRGB CIE-D50 Color Matrix
# sRGB CIE-A Color Matrix
# [Black Saturation ISO-list ...]
# [...]

Version 1.1
